my graphics card 845G

do you mean suspend or do you mean shutdown

if i dont restart ubuntu, i use alt+sys rq + REISUB -> windows network work properly

is the nic in windows disabled/
check in network places -> properties
in my win: it dont have wake on lan option
thats not what i asked
if you look at your nic devices in network places, is the device disabled
it will also say in device manager
http://www.microsoft.com/library/media/1033/windowsxp/images/using/networking/maintain/68602-click-enable.gif

try heading into device manager and uninstalling the device, then click scan for new hardware to see if it jumps into life
if you have wake on lan for ubuntu it will be holding the device waiting for the magic packet
